page.title: 13Warren's Furniture Shop.
page.content: Mr. Warren is an Antique Furniture Restorer. He works in a small shop behind his house in Leiston High Street. He runs the business with the help of his wife. He repairs all kinds of furniture. There are chairs, tables, chests-of-drawers, cabinets, desks and bureaus. He keeps all the damaged furniture in a storage room. When they are ready for repair, he takes it to his workshop. In here he has machines for sawing up the new wood, shaping and planing it. sometimes table tops require leather on their top surface. It needs skill and patience to make a good job of it. First he cuts the leather to the correct size. He paints the bare table top all over with solvite. Then carefully lays the leather down on top. He decorates the leather with gold paint using a special instrument.
